thread.section_title: Pullman Paris Tour Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: GREAT BED
thread.title_full: GREAT BED - Review of Pullman Paris Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Kahlyn M
title: GREAT BED
text:
The room had no air conditioner but we survived with the balcony door opened. The bed was fantastic, seriously. The bathroom had a waterfall shower! We loved the room. The breakfast was good. However the only complaint i have is the room had no drier, and we called three times to get one. I waited an hour for one and it never came.
Room Tip: You can see the Eiffel Tower from the garden view rooms, but its noisy. See more room tips
